majnrujclient.options.title: MAJNRUJ Client Options
majnrujclient.options.fix-chat-stutter.t: Enabling will process chat on another thread so it doesn't clog up the render thread
majnrujclient.options.bee-count-in-debug: Enabling will add bee counts in the debug screen (F3) when looking at bee hives and nests
majnrujclient.options.send-telemetry.too: Enabling will send telemetry to mCore-based servers. This is used to help us improve the client
majnrujclient.options.send-periodic-tele: Enabling will keep sending periodic telemetry data to mCore-based servers. This is used to help us improve the client
majnrujclient.options.use-discord-rich-p: Enabling will use Discord Rich Pressence to make your Discord profile look even better
majnrujclient.options.use-better-chat.to: Enabling will use Majnruj's Better Chat instead of Mojang's
majnrujclient.options.splash-screen.tool: Enabling will use Majnruj's splash screen instead of Mojang's
majnrujclient.options.window-title.toolt: Enabling will use Majnruj's window title instead of Mojang's
majnrujclient.options.seat.title: Adjust Seat for %s
